header.desciption: Life may be a meandering path but don't worry about it, rather enjoy it. Work hard and be kind and amazing things will happen.
about.title: Who I am?
about.description1: Hello :) My name is Roman. I'm junior web developer from Ukraine.
about.description2: I am a graduate of the Rzeszow University of Technology with an engineering degree in the Engineering of Information Systems. I am currently learning Frontend Web Development and am searching for my first commercial experience.

projects.data.desc: My personal portfolio website contains all the information from my CV and more.

projects.data.name: Memory
projects.data.desc: A game designed to train memory by remembering and matching the same cards in a pool. Customizable card type and number. Theme changer and audio effects included.

projects.data.name: Weather
projects.data.desc: Web application to track weather with the help of OpenWeather API and custom React hooks.

projects.data.name: Planets
projects.data.desc: A beautiful website showcases many facts about the planets of our solar system. Animated with 'framer motion', styled with 'styled components'.
